name: Invoice.account
title: Invoice.account
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Account which is supposed to be balanced with this Invoice.
element.comment: Systems posting the ChargeItems might not always be able to determine, which accounts the Items need to be places into. It is up to the potprocessing Financial System to apply internal rules to decide based on the Encounter/EpisodeOfCare/Patient/Coverage context and the type of ChargeItem, which Account is appropriate.
